protocol.name: P-MTAB-30406
protocol.text: Samples were grown on MS3 media 3% sucrose for 7 days, prior to the dawn of the 8th day, they were collected. Col-0 wild type and tic-2 mutant, a T-DNA insertion, were used. 12:12 photoperiod, samplig took place 10 minutes before dawn of the 8th day. 2 biological replicates per genotype were performed.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-30407
protocol.text: Sample collection 10 minutes before dawn on the 8th day of growth

protocol.name: P-MTAB-30409
protocol.text: cDNA using the MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced kit from Ambion

protocol.name: P-MTAB-30410
protocol.text: GC-RMA algorithm and a Cyber-T statistical test for pair comparisons

protocol.name: P-MTAB-30412
protocol.text: Hybridization with Affymetrix protocol EukGe-WS2v4 by using the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450
